UseCases

Class Admin

  • java.lang.Object
    • UseCases.User
      • UseCases.Admin

  • public class Admin
extends User
    Admin is a specific type of User. It extends the User class. The Admin can create users: instructors & students. The Admin can also edit holds, and edit courses/classes.
    Version:
    November 17th, 2016
    Author:
    Ulises Martinez, Jorge Huerta, Christopher Tighe, Team Siki
    See Also:
    User

      • Fields inherited from class UseCases.User

    • Constructor Detail

      • Admin

        public Admin(java.lang.String u,
             java.lang.String p,
             java.lang.String n,
             int id,
             ClassStore classes,
             UserService users)
        Constructor for the Admin class.
        Parameters:
        u - Username for the Admin.
        p - Admin's password.
        n - Admin's full name.
        id - Admin's identification number.
        classes - This parameter stores classes.
        users - This parameter stores users, and allows them to log in.

      • removeHold

        public void removeHold(Student student)
        Allows the Admin to remove a hold on a student. Calls method from student class.
        Parameters:
        student - The student who will have her hold removed.
        See Also:
        Student
